original_title: Rivers and Roads: The Head And The Heart - Live from Pike Place Market
overview: The Head and the Heart return to their Seattle roots to play a rooftop concert at the city's infamous Pike Place Market in front of the market's iconic clock and sign. Watch as the band performs a high energy concert in front of 30,000 hometown fans, two stories from where they originally started busking for tips ten years ago.
title: Rivers and Roads: The Head And The Heart - Live from Pike Place Market
